title: Families Of Charleston, S.C., Victims Say They Will Not 'Let Hate Take Over'
teaser: Charleston, S.C., residents are mourning the loss of nine people who were fatally shot Wednesday at a historic black church. A judge set a $1 million bond Friday on the weapons charge for the suspect.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
